post.title: Atlas Transparency
post.content: I went to a brownbag today on Atlas, though since it was at 10am there was no one eating lunch or any brownbags to be seen. As cool as the Atlas project is, the coolest thing is that when I asked where their internal web site was, Johnathan said they didn’t have one – just the public http://atlas.asp.net/ site. How about that for transparency! More of that, please!
